price: 18. (C’est) le jour où il sera soufflé dans le Cor et où vous viendrez en foules.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
